Batch Pools must be configured to use a VNet in the users subscription.  This enables the use of NSGs to secure the network traffic for the Batch Account.  See https://aka.ms/netiso/vnetinjection for more details

HDInsight Clusters must use the Custom configuration option to configure a VNet in the subscriptiong.  This enables the use of NSGs to secure the network traffic for the HDInsight cluster.  See https://aka.ms/netiso/vnetinjection for more details

Kubernets must use the Advanced Networking option to configure the Kubernetes cluster to use a Virtual Network that is on the subscription of the user.  This enables the use of NSGs to secure the network traffic for the Kubernetes container.  See https://aka.ms/netiso/vnetinjection for more details

properties.displayName: Do not use Management REST API in APIM
properties.description: The credentials used to access API Management REST API provide admin-level access without support for role-based access control and without recording audit logs. properties.displayName: Remote debugging should be turned off for Web Applications
properties.description: Remote debugging requires inbound ports to be opened on App Service. These ports become easy targets for compromise from various internet based attacks. For more information, identify the 'Control Name' here: https://aka.ms/AzTBCnAI. If an incident is related to following policy, please open an IcM incident via https://aka.ms/atb_support

properties.displayName: Use Approved TLS Version in App Services
properties.description: TLS provides privacy and data integrity between client and server. Using approved TLS version significantly reduces risks from security design issues and security bugs that may be present in older versions. properties.displayName: App Services should use secure FTP deployments

properties.displayName: Microsoft Defender for Containers should be enabled on Subscriptions
properties.description: MDC is a Cloud Security Posture Management and Cloud Workload Protection Platform for all Azure/on-premises/multicloud resources. properties.description: Defender Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) provides enhanced posture capabilities and a new intelligent cloud security graph to help identify, prioritize, and reduce risk. Please contact Tier 2 Remediation Support through Service Now via https://aka.ms/ATB_Support. properties.displayName: Azure Storage account access keys should rotate on periodic basis
properties.description: In response to a recent security incident, Microsoft recommends that you rotate your access keys periodically to keep your storage account secure. For more information, https://aka.ms/SecureAccessToStorageAccounts. If an incident is related to following policy, please open an incident via https://aka.ms/ATB_Support

properties.displayName: Ensure secure access to storage account containers
properties.description: In response to a recent security incident, Microsoft recommends disabling public access which allows information to be downloaded by anyone on the internet without authentication and that can lead to a compromise of corporate data. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/SecureAccessToStorageAccounts. If an incident is related to following policy, please open an incident via https://aka.ms/ATB_Support
